nodes.text: Don't worry, you'll get over your disappointment about Katie. She's just not the right person for you.
But I love her! She's skuttled my heart in the sea of despair.
I just don't want to talk about it right now.
Sounds like you've got a crush on Katie now.
A crush? More like she's got me sailing on the clouds above a dawn studded sea! She's the captain of my heart!
Aren't you going overboard a bit with this?
I sea you dawn appreciate my metaphor if you assail my sea-sun-all imagery.
So it's Katie you're in love with now, is it?
How could I not be? She's smart and strong and unafraid to say what she thinks. She's the sort of woman for whom you would sail the seven seas to win her love.
I wrote her a song about it...

Katie, Katie, I'd sail the sea with you.
Be my first matey, tell me that you'll be true.

We can't sail the way we ought,
I can't afford a yacht,
But away we'll float, on our rowboat,
As we row on the ocean blue.
What do you think - will she like it?

options.text: Tell Aeolus that Katie Isn't Interested in Him

nodes.text: I talked briefly to Katie about you. She doesn't really want to date you.
What? No... She must have misunderstood you. I'm sure I can win her heart just as she has stolen mine away like the pirate queen she is.
I'll just have to talk to her myself.
I think she'll find the song first mate... er rate.
We'll sea if it floats her boat.
That song sunk. You're a fish out of water when it comes to writing love songs.
I don't think Katie is the right woman for you, Aeolus. She seems more interested in becoming a sea captain than she is in romance.

I'm probably the first guy to sail into her world and woo her with words. She needs a strong mate at her side to weather the storms. I'll be her main mast and she'll be my home port. We can be shipmates on the sea of life.
Shawn, please help me. Talk to Katie and see if she likes me, if only a little.
Sure, I'll talk to Katie about you when I get a chance.
Thank you so much! Let her know that I wor-ship her fore and aft. She's got me hooked.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Talk to Katie Himself

nodes.text: I'm sorry, Aeolus, but the only person who should speak to Katie about you is you.
<sigh> I'll try talking with her tomorrow.
Hate to break it to you, but Katie is my girl.
You are going with Katie? Why didn't you tell me before I fell in love with her?
How could I know that you were going to suddenly fall for Katie?
You're my best friend, Shawn. I don't want to come between you and Katie... I hope you two are happy together.
What do you mean, Katie is 'your girl'? You've never even talked about her to me.
I'll leave it up to Katie to decide who she likes best. I'll talk to her and find out how she really feels.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: As long as you are dancing on air, why don't you dance around the room and pick some things up while you are at it? That way you don't trip.
When I'm dancing, I'd trip over my own feet even without all the stuff on the floor. I'll stick to playing music, thanks.
As long as Katie is sweeping you off your feet, why don't you borrow that broom to clean up this room?
That would be a sweep of faith on my part that could broom my relationship with Katie.
If you are going to spend the whole night thinking about Katie songs - try working on the lyrics rather than the melody, please. It's less noisy.
I'll try not to compose during my repose while Katie floats on the loveboats of my dreams.
Good night.
How can it be a good night if you want to steal away the woman of my heart?
